StringProperty.Name: AppDebuggerTitleId
StringProperty.Description: Specifies the Title ID of the installed package to debug.

StringProperty.Name: AppDebuggerCommandArguments
StringProperty.Description: The command line arguments to pass to the application.

EnumProperty.Name: AppDebuggerExecutableLoadLocation
EnumProperty.Description: Specifies where to load the application's executable from. When set to "Auto" the system will load the executable from the working directory of the application.

StringProperty.Name: AppDebuggerCommand
StringProperty.Description: The path to the executable to debug.

StringProperty.Name: AppDebuggerCommandTarget
StringProperty.Description: The path to the executable to debug on the devkit. This will be located in the /data directory.

EnumProperty.Name: AppDebuggerWorkingDirectory
EnumProperty.Description: Specifies the working directory (/app0). For "System Managed", depending on the application's installation status, files will come from HDD or BD. When "Blu-ray Disc (forcibly)" is selected, files will always come from BD.

EnumProperty.Name: AppDebuggerBRMount
EnumProperty.Description: Specifies that the Blu-ray is to be mounted on application launch. Either the physical drive can be mounted, or an ISO image can be mounted through emulation.

StringProperty.Name: AppDebuggerBREmulIso
StringProperty.Description: The path to the ISO image provided from USB to use for emulation.

EnumProperty.Name: AppDebuggerSystemLibraryVerification
EnumProperty.Description: Perform argument validation for specific SDK functions. When Debugging, an exception dialog will be displayed on failure. When Running, "Warn" will generate a console message, and "Abort" will also exit the process.

StringProperty.Name: AppRunCommandLine
StringProperty.Description: The additional command line arguments to pass to the Run utility when using Start Without Debugging.
